snippet: The Rangers rookie Chris Kreider was benched for much of Game 4 after making a key giveaway that led to a Capitals goal. "I'm not about to bury myself over it," he said. "I learned from it - it'll never happen again."
abstract: The Rangers rookie Chris Kreider was benched for much of Game 4 after making a key giveaway that led to a Capitals goal. "I'm not about to bury myself over it," he said. "I learned from it - it'll never happen again."

headline.main: Kreider Says He Learned from Game 4 Mistakes
